channel.title: Comments on: CFEclipse tip – Recovering a deleted file
channel.description: Web development notes and commentary from Ryan Stille

item.title: By: Mike Henke
item.dc:creator: Mike Henke
item.description: A more direct way to recover a deleted file is to right click on the project folder and select "Restore from Local History".
item.content:encoded: A more direct way to recover a deleted file is to right click on the project folder and select "Restore from Local History".
